pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Fan)Wiki Link/$ $(br)This Upgrade Pushes Mobs all living entities (Players/Mobs/Animals) in front of it.$(li)A player who is Crouching, will not be effected by the fan.

This Upgrade Is effected by Entity Filtering Blocks placed below it.$)br)This upgrade can accept these Enchantments:$(li)Range - Increases fan push height$(li)Capacity - Increases Fan Range (AOE)$(li)Speed - Increases Fan Push Speed
